title: NO FEE-AUGUST OR SEPBTEMBER - SUNNY-SPACIOUS 1 BEDROOM!
posting_body: ['PROPERTY INFO', 'ID: 149085801', 'Rent: $1,950 / Month', 'Beds: 1', 'Bath: 1', 'Available Date: 08/15/2022', 'Pet: Cats Allowed', 'Rent Includes:: Heat, Hot Water', 'NO FEE! -*** AVAILABLE AUGUST or SEPTEMBER-FOR 12 MONTHS - - Fantastic 1 bedroom apartment.', 'Hardwood throughout the apartment.', 'Tiled bathroom.', 'Cats are OK!', 'Laundry is downstairs in the basement and there is no cost for heat and hot water.', 'Heat and hot water are included in the rent.', 'Short distance to the B train line and bus stops.', 'Close by plenty of restaurants and store.', 'BSC Gym nearby.', 'To view this apartment or for any questions, please send inquires about this apartment to David', 'Cats are OK!', 'No dogs, without ESA letter from a Dr. Laundry is downstairs in the basement and there is no cost for heat and hot water.', 'Heat and hot water are included in the rent.', 'There is NO FEE on this apartment.']
